summary: Various analysts propose a psychological examination of the Dark Knight.
cast: Robert Clotworthy|Paul Levitz|Robin S. Rosenberg|Cary A. Friedman|Jeffrey Lieberman|Charles Roven|Ben Karney|Christopher Nolan|Robert T.M. Phillips|Denny O'Neil|Christian Bale|Dan DiDio|Danny Fingeroth|Len Wein|Emma Thomas
director: Writer: Steven C. Smith (as Steven Smith)
title: Batman Unmasked
